mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM IsuPrioritySolution o WHERE o.orgId=#{orgId}
AND o.disabled!=TRUE AND o.deleted!=TRUE ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.insert: insert into IsuPrioritySolution (name,orgId, isDefault, isBuildIn,deleted,disabled,createTime) values (#{name},#{orgId}, #{isDefault}, #{isBuildIn}, FALSE,FALSE,NOW())
mapper.update:
UPDATE IsuPrioritySolution SET name=#{name}, disabled=#{disabled}, updateTime=NOW()
WHERE id=#{id} AND orgId=#{orgId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IsuPrioritySolutionItem WHERE solutionId=#{solutionId} AND orgId=#{orgId}
